message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product to you today for $10,000. I believe it holds significant value and will be very beneficial for you.
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $7,000. I believe that's a fair price for the product, considering its value and my budget.
Bob, I understand your perspective on the price. However, $7,000 is significantly below its true value. I could consider letting it go for $9,000.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $7,500 for the product. Can you meet me at this price?
